pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Dependent Shared Frailty Cox Model // Fits time-dependent shared frailty Cox model (specifically the adapted Paik et al.'s Model) based on the paper "Centre-Effect on Survival After Bone Marrow Transplantation: Application of Time- Dependent Frailty Models", by C.M. Wintrebert, H. Putter, A.H. Zwinderman and J.C. van Houwelingen (2004) doi:10.1002/bimj.200310051.
